title: Immediate hypnotic induction with Fascination - the power of the gaze / dr. Marco Paret
description:
Non-verbal hypnosis can increase charisma and personal magnetism synchronicities and set oneself on the alchemical path of awakening. Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates immediate hypnotic induction with Fascination - the power of the gaze. The subject is one of his students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. She immediately entered in a deep hypnotic state of induction and catalepsy trance state.  Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
